Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Animal figurine
Description: The craftsman gave this animal figurine very precise features: a rather large muzzle shaped like a snout, small pointy ears and a large backbone that begins at the level of the shoulders. It could be a hyena or an animal of the Suidae family, a specimen of which was uncovered at Kerma.
